#summary Some notes about Ubuntu's UFW firewall

= UFW Documentation=

https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UFW

= Show open ports =

{{{
sudo ufw status
}}}

= Xplico =
Xplico runs on port 9876, which is not open to the outside world by default.

= Open a port =
Suppose you want to open port 9876 for Xplico:

{{{
sudo ufw allow 9876/tcp
}}}
